description.header_description: Average arrival velocity across selected cycles.
Percentage of cycles with successful arrivals.
description.plot_description:
● Green circles: Successful arrivals
● Red circles: Non-arrivals
● Circle size: Cycle duration

description.header_description:
Ratio of productive time to total cycle time.
$\text{Uptime Ratio} = \frac{\text{Flow Duration}}{\text{Total Cycle Duration}}$
description.plot_title: Shut-in, Arrival, After-flow Durations vs. Cycle #
description.plot_description:
Shows Shut-in, Arrival, After Flow Duration for each cycle.
● Red: After-flow duration
● Yellow: Arrival duration
● Green: Shut-in duration
● Bar length: Total cycle duration

description.header_description: Average Gas Volume across selected cycles.
description.plot_description: Shows gas volume for each cycle

description.header_description: Average of flow rates across selected cycles during flow periods.
description.plot_description:
Avg. flow-rate during the flow period of each selected cycle.

● Color-coded bars: Flow rate distribution histogram
- Green: Low flow rates
- Yellow: Medium flow rates
- Red: High flow rates
● Bar height: Mean flow rate for the cycle
● Overlay line: Trend of mean flow rates across cycles

Interactive features:
● Click any bar: Detailed flow rate vs. time plot for that cycle
● Hover shows: Cycle #, Mean flow rate, Min/max flow rate

description.header_description:
Relationship between uplift pressure and arrival velocity.
Range: -1 to 1.
description.plot_description:
● Circle size: Cycle duration
● Color: Uplift pressure
- Green: low
- Red: high
● Circle Position: Arrival Velocity

● Circle size: Cycle duration
● Color: Uplift pressure
- Green: low
- Red: high
● Circle Position: Arrival Velocity
● Green border: Arrival
● Red border: Non-arrival

description.header_description:
Average liquid column pressure difference.
$\text{Liquid Load} = \text{Casing Pressure}_\text{ Shut-in end} - \text{Tubing Pressure}_\text{ Shut-in end}$
description.plot_description: Shows liquid load at shut-in end

description.header_description: Average line pressure at shut-in end.
description.plot_description: Shows line pressure at shut-in end

description.header_description:
Pressure buildup rate during shut-in.
$\text{Shut-in Effectiveness} = \frac{\text{Uplift Pressure}_\text{ Shut-in end} - \text{Uplift Pressure}_\text{ Shut-in start}}{\text{Shut-in Duration}}$
description.plot_title: Shut-in Duration, Uplift Pressure vs. Cycle #
description.plot_description:
● Bars: Shut-in duration of each cycle
● Line: Uplift pressure per cycle

description.header_description: Average gas rate during flow period.
description.plot_description:
● Line: Gas volume
● Bars: Flow duration

description.header_description: Correlation between Velocity in the next cycle and residual flow in the current cycle.
description.plot_description:
● Line: Arrival velocity of the next cycle
● Bars: Residual Flow
● Green Bars: Arrival
● Red Bars: Non-arrival

description.header_description:
Average flow rate decline during Afterflow across selected cycles.
$\text{Drop Ratio} = \frac{\text{Flow Rate}_\text{ Afterflow Start} - \text{Flow Rate}_\text{ Afterflow End}}{\text{Flow Rate}_\text{ Afterflow Start}}$
description.plot_title: Flow Rate Drop Ratio vs. Cycle #
description.plot_description: Shows flow rate decline during Afterflow period per cycle.

description.header_description:
Average Casing pressure reduction efficiency across selected cycles.
$\text{Drain Ratio} = {\text{Casing Pressure}_\text{ Cycle End} - \text{Casing Pressure}_\text{Flow Start}}$
description.plot_description: Shows casing pressure reduction efficiency per cycle.

description.header_description: Average flow rate at after-flow end across selected cycles
description.plot_description: Shows residual flow rate at after-flow end per cycle.
